mapper.select: /* 프로젝트 댓글 리스트 */ SELECT PCOMT_SEQ as "seq", PCOMT_PROJ_SEQ as "projectSeq", PCOMT_NAME as "name", PCOMT_PWD as "password", PCOMT_CONTENTS as "contents", PCOMT_DATE as "date", PCOMT_PARENT_SEQ as "parentSeq" FROM TB_PTFOLIO_PROJECT_COMT WHERE PCOMT_PROJ_SEQ = #{projectSeq} ORDER BY CONCAT(IF(PCOMT_PARENT_SEQ is null, COALESCE(PCOMT_PARENT_SEQ, ''), CONCAT('_', LPAD(PCOMT_PARENT_SEQ,6,'0')) ), '_',LPAD(PCOMT_SEQ,6,'0')) LIMIT #{startRow}, #{perPgLine}

/* 프로젝트 댓글 가져오기 */ SELECT PCOMT_SEQ as "seq", PCOMT_PROJ_SEQ as "projectSeq", PCOMT_NAME as "name", PCOMT_PWD as "password", PCOMT_CONTENTS as "contents", PCOMT_DATE as "DATE", PCOMT_PARENT_SEQ as "parentSeq" FROM TB_PTFOLIO_PROJECT_COMT WHERE PCOMT_SEQ = #{seq}
